short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon music media controls from any tab. Simply click Alt+Left arrow key or right arrow to go to a prev or next song, respectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This allows the user to go to the next or previous song, in Amazon Music web player, by clicking Ctrl+Right Arrow or Ctrl+Left Arrow in any tab.
